sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 'groupBlocking' (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, number VARCHAR(10) CONSTRAINT number UNIQUE, name VARCHAR(100), unblocked SMALLINT DEFAULT 0, offline SMALLINT DEFAULT 1) ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 'smartBlocking' (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, number VARCHAR(10) CONSTRAINT number UNIQUE, name VARCHAR(100), numUserBlcks INTEGER, unblocked SMALLINT DEFAULT 0, offline SMALLINT DEFAULT 1) ;
